text: Aeolidia libitinaria is a species of sea slug in the family Aeolidiidae. It was found near a dead whale, inside the Monteray Canyon, 380 meters below the ocean surface. It was named libitinaria, meaning "undertaker" in Latin. ==References== Category:Aeolidiidae Category:Gastropods described in 2018 Category:Molluscs of the Pacific Ocean
title: Aeolidia libitinaria
